title: Browser Extension
description: We have developed a revolutionary cross-browser extension that empowers you to surf the internet seamlessly and without any restrictions.

title: Customer Service Support
description: We provide support that is accessible to people with disabilities, including but not limited to a chat bot, and an AI for speech recognition that helps blind people to easily navigate on the website.

title: Online Resources
description: We plan to provide online resources, such as tutorials and articles, that are tailored to the needs of people with disabilities, to help them learn more about makeup and skincare.

title: Accessible Website
description: Our website is designed to be accessible for people with disabilities, with features such as alt text for images, easy-to-navigate menus, and compatibility with screen readers.

title: Community Outreach
description: We plan to engage in community outreach to promote inclusivity and raise awareness about the needs of people with disabilities, including partnerships with disability advocacy organizations and sponsorships of disability-friendly events.

title: Personalized Recommendations
description: We plan to offer personalized recommendations for cosmetics based on your needs and preferences, taking into account any specific requirements related to your disability.
